name: Tierklavier - Animal Piano
description:
Tierklavier is a simple Piano APP for toddlers. It includes a frog piano for FREE.

NOTE: Do NOT buy this App, if you've already got PLAYGROUND 1. Playground 1 includes all 4 Pianos!

THE UNLOCKED TIERKLAVIER INCLUDES:
• 4 motives each with 8 animals (cats, frogs, cows, fish)
• Lovely animal sounds
• Piano Sound
• NO ADS

- Don´t buy this App if you´ve already got Playground 1!
- It´s the same pianos - so you will probably regret it! ;)

Best rankings so far:
#1 Educational Game on both iPhone AND iPad in Belarus for 10 days
#1 Educational Game on iPad in 8 more Countries for 2 days+ :)
#1 Kids Game on iPad in 3 Countries for 2 days+ :)

Dear parents,
PLEASE contact me for any help, concerns or suggestions to improve this App. Don´t hesitate to contact me via mail:
spielplatz@janessig.com :)

A short review would be wonderful

Best regards and have fun playing
Jan Essig
developers: Jan Essig: Educational Apps & Silly Games
